name: Rock Rhythm
description:
Play along to songs by local artists on your keyboard!

For source code, feedback, and code contributions:
 https://github.com/ConnorWhalen/RhythmGameGame

See the manual for instructions on how to create your owns tracks. Write them in your favourite MIDI sequencer and play them in the game!

If you want your chart in the official game, or you want me to write a chart for your song, send me a DM!
